resources.string: Enter Your District and the ward

My name is Idoko Jerry Agada. I completed my Bachelor degree in Electrical and Electronics engineering from federal University Of Agriculture Makurdi in 2017. I have passion in developing software as well as electronics design. I program using Java Swing and database(sqlite).I have developed Business transaction monitoring and point of sale receipt for numerous business owners.

This App was developed to help in the fight against the break down of law and order. Most time some cases is left unreported or because the victim is afraid of reporting the issue to the Security agents. You can sit in the comfort of your home and make a call or type a report and send it to the Security agency in the state. I know security is every body\'s business, and i believed the crime rate will be reduced if this app is being put to used.
